Posts.Content: How can i get support when i hate asking for it? Im not been selfish but its affecting my mental health and like most people have brothers and sisters to turn to i dont have any, so people are going to think im a horrible nasty person, ive told her if my grandma can beat it then she can too xx
Posts.Title: Just been told by mum she has breast cancer

Posts.Content: my grandma had breast cancer a few years ago, my mum has it now, its genetic apparently, how the **** do i stay strong for my mum when i have no brothers or sisters to turn to?
Posts.Title: Just been told by mum she has breast cancer

Posts.Content: she has been told its genetic and been advised to make sure i register with a doctors but i still dont get how i can be strong when i have no brothers or sisters to turn to and the friends i have im not even sure they are friends
Posts.Title: Just been told by mum she has breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thank you to everyone who has showed their support, my family are fighters and i think keeping positive is best
Posts.Title: Just been told by mum she has breast cancer

Posts.Content: firstly ive mentioned feeling selfish for not having siblings, secondly i assumed most people do have siblings and thirdly i posted on main post the others were replies, maybe me pushing people away was the right answer after all
Posts.Title: Just been told by mum she has breast cancer

Posts.Content: my uncle passed away from bowel cancer this time 2 christmasses ago so ive said i aint celebrating and it seems like bad things seem to happen when im around
Posts.Title: Is it selfish of me to tell my mum if my grandma she can beat it too...

Posts.Content: im not sure if im being selfish or not, but ive told my mum after she recently been diagnosed with breast cancer, a genetic type which my grandma had, that if my grandma can beat it she can too. I wish she hadnt told me it was genetic as I'd rather not of known cos im really sensitive to things regarding health. Ive promised her i will try counselling which she says I need but shouldnt i be saying to myself: "forget me, mum and rest of family are more important?" I know its curable but Im still scared
Posts.Title: Is it selfish of me to tell my mum if my grandma she can beat it too...

Posts.Content: Thankyou Alison could you send me a private message, you seem the most open and honest person on here, im glad it has been caught early and im glad she told me right from the first biopsy
Posts.Title: Is it selfish of me to tell my mum if my grandma she can beat it too...

Posts.Content: also how will radiotherapy affect her?
Posts.Title: Is it selfish of me to tell my mum if my grandma she can beat it too...

Posts.Content: Just want to say thank you to everyone's advice which they gave during my mums diagnosis. It had been caught early and she needed an operation to remove lymph nodes which was a success. After hearing the good news it gave me confidence, to go for the genetic test. And not be frightened if I do find anything,
Posts.Title: Well Good News So Far :)
